post_content:
1909 T206 Huggins hands to mouth-corner wear all four corners. I direct your attention to the front bottom right. Also, on the back a stain where the frame divides diagonally up to the right of the "The CIGARETTE of QUALITY." $150.00

S/h is $5.65 outside of California, Oregon or the state of Washington in which case the s/h is $6.05. S/h to Hawaii or Alaska is higher. 

If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url]
